title: Queue dodge punishment, but I didn't dodge
body:
During a 5v5 queue using draft pick, someone dodged the queue at the last second, and I was punished for queue dodging - which I didn't do, this resulted in roughly a 15 minute waste of my time. Fix this. I have seen this multiple times. 

I was not in a party, so it wasn't related to a party member, I was going solo.

replies.body: I just got hit with a 15 minute ban from poro king.  I auto locked my champ first in two different que's.  Someone else dodged both and now I have to wait...  I agree with punishing dodgers, but DO IT CORRECTLY
wth...exact same thing happened to me...barely play this game anymore as it is, now unjustified 15min ban...sweet, peace
Happened me too... wtf riot fix ur sht
reporting in,just happened right now, why is this a thing

this just happened to me and im here to see anyone else with same issue.
what the f is this LOL. this never happened to me before, so im wondering this happens only when playing poro king?{{summoner:31}}
Happened to my clubmate earlier today.
I got punished for no reason, what the hell, i didn't dodge, someone else did

This just happened to me right now in ranked and I recieved a loss of LP for the dodge.  I have video evidence of the whole encounter because it happened at the very beginning of my stream.  It was very obvious someone crashing the queue somehow because they had their champ banned.  It kicked me back to the game lobby with a 5 minute timer.... wtf rito pls!!  Where can I submit video of this happening?  And will any action be taken to restore the loss LP?
Yep just happened to me 30 min dodge q, and I had locked.  Riot, riot I left for 3 years because of shit like this.  Think I'll be taking my ass back to paragon or dota2 :P

I ranked for a Ranked Flex and had my champion Sona picked (not locked in) because I don't like people who auto lock. My player name is AaronisaPirate and on 4:40-4:41pm 2/20/2018 western American time, I was punished for dodging and clearly didn't. There was one player on the bottom screen who hadn't picked a champ yet (after the bans), so I was like oh boy now time to do this over and it banned me instead. I've never seen this happen. my Ban was only a few minutes, but still was uncalled for and would love to be recognized or atleast reimbursed with a free skin for this.

I jusy got a 30 minute ban playing Poro King! I had my main and I was happy and locked and it just went back and told me I left during champ select... And I've never dodged queue on purpose either, LoL kept crashing during champ select on my other computer so I got such a long timer ._.
Just happened to me as well what a waste of my god dang time.
Same thing happened to me on several occasions. This is getting frustrating.
I'm still having this problem today

Yes, since the new patch I have been punished for dodging 5 times already - best part is, I didn't dodge - 30 min wait every time.
